title: Ain't but Two Days in a Month: The First and the Fifteenth
description: The stories in Ethel “Ettie” Cook-Wilson’s latest work will take you to a simpler place and time—a time when neighbors knew and looked out for each other, sometimes too much! Ain’t But Two Days in a Month is a glimpse of the folks in Orange Bloom and their doings in and around payday. Some paid what they had to, while others bought temporary happiness and long-term misery. Nevertheless, they all looked forward to The First and the Fifteenth!
author: Ethel Cook-Wilson
